title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Osteoporosis and Bone Health
purpose: To raise awareness of osteoporosis amongst parliamentarians and to influence legislation and policy makers to improve the lives of people living with the condition. The APPG will consider how to promote behavioural change and systems changes so people of all ages can strengthen their bones and prevent osteoporosis.

contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: James Dobson, Royal Osteoporosis Society. Tel: 01761 473 102
contact_details.secretariat: Royal Osteoporosis Society acts as the group's secretariat.https://theros.org.uk/

detailed_benefits.Description: Royal Osteoporosis Society is funded by UCB and Theramex to act as the group's secretariat From : 12/11/2024 To  : 11/11/2025
